A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: A horrible showing of how disney doesn't care for the franchise they acquired and just wants to squeeze money from it. From the horrible merchandise chickens\, passing by the unrecognizable Luke\, the inconsecuential Finn\, the incredibly boring Rose\, the meaningless Snoke and the fanboy friendly death of useless Phasma (showing Brienne's eye\, so you can know its her)\, for me\, Star Wars dies with this movie. Episode 7 was bad\, but this is a plain joke.
